
```{r, include=FALSE}
`%>%` <- magrittr::`%>%`
blue <- function(x) {
  glue::glue(
    '<span style="color:#6495ed; font-weight: bold;">{x}</span>'
  ) %>% 
    htmltools::HTML()
}

colorido <- function(x, cor) {
  glue::glue(
    '<span style="color:{cor}; font-weight: bold;">{x}</span>'
  ) %>% 
    htmltools::HTML()
}

options(width = 85)
```
